member.name: T:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter
member.summary: Static utility class to convert DataTable and SerializableDataTable to Markdown format

member.name: P:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.NewlineCharacter
member.summary: Newline character to use in all markdown conversion operations. Defaults to Environment.NewLine.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.Convert(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Convert an entire DataTable to markdown format.
member.returns: Markdown formatted string representation of the table, or null if no columns are defined.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.Convert(SerializableDataTables.SerializableDataTable)
member.summary: Convert an entire SerializableDataTable to markdown format.
member.returns: Markdown formatted string representation of the table, or null if no columns are defined.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.ConvertHeaders(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Convert just the headers of a DataTable to markdown format.
member.param: The DataTable whose headers to convert.
member.returns: Markdown formatted string representation of the table headers.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.ConvertHeaders(SerializableDataTables.SerializableDataTable)
member.summary: Convert just the headers of a SerializableDataTable to markdown format.
member.param: The SerializableDataTable whose headers to convert.
member.returns: Markdown formatted string representation of the table headers.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.ConvertRow(System.Data.DataTable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a specific row of a DataTable to markdown format.
member.param: Zero-based index of the row to convert.
member.returns: Markdown formatted string representation of the row.
member.exception: Thrown when rowNumber is outside the bounds of the rows collection.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.ConvertRow(SerializableDataTables.SerializableDataTable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a specific row of a SerializableDataTable to markdown format.
member.param: Zero-based index of the row to convert.
member.returns: Markdown formatted string representation of the row.
member.exception: Thrown when rowNumber is outside the bounds of the rows collection.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.IterateRows(System.Data.DataTable)
member.summary: Iterate through rows of a DataTable, yielding the markdown representation of each row.
member.returns: IEnumerable of strings, each representing a row in markdown format.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.MarkdownConverter.IterateRows(SerializableDataTables.SerializableDataTable)
member.summary: Iterate through rows of a SerializableDataTable, yielding the markdown representation of each row.
member.returns: IEnumerable of strings, each representing a row in markdown format.

member.name: P:SerializableDataTables.SerializableColumn.OriginalType
member.summary: Original element type for array columns. Null for non-array columns or when type preservation is not required. Stored as the assembly-qualified type name for serialization compatibility.

member.name: M:SerializableDataTables.SerializableDataTable.ToMarkdown
member.summary: Convert to a markdown table string.
member.returns: Markdown formatted string representation of the table, or null if no columns are defined.
